ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived - Autopsy Machine
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a machine which can perform autopsies.
It isn't much to look at - probably because whoever designed it lacks any artistic talent - but it works quicker than a human doctor and never needs to take a break; not only that, it will even butcher the corpse when it has finished.
(Credit to the PRF team for the preview image; I just slapped text on it because I can't draw.)
